editorialDecl.p: Errors in transcription of the printed text not controlled.

div.p: Telegram to President Davis about Aug. 1863
Sir - It is essential that no forces now in this Department be ordered from it. as is apprehended A further raid is apprehended - I will write more in detail by morning Mail -
